nodes.text: Redhill Hall was a structure that served as the administrative center of the rural Redhill province on the Chiss Ascendancy planet of Celwis. Redhill Hall was located in the city Redhill.
Councilor Xodlak'uvi'vil managed Redhill province affairs of the Xodlak family with his Senior Aide Xodlak'ji'iprip from the White Judgment Seat of Redhill Hall.
